trans-unit.source: How to Configure New Companies | Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: How to Configure New Companies | Microsoft Docs

target.mrk: Jak nakonfigurovat nové společnosti | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: You can configure and customize a new company that you have created.

seg-source.mrk: You can configure and customize a new company that you have created.

target.mrk: Můžete nakonfigurovat a přizpůsobit novou společnost, kterou jste vytvořili.

trans-unit.source: To fine tune your implementation, you proceed in three phases to complete your configuration.

seg-source.mrk: To fine tune your implementation, you proceed in three phases to complete your configuration.

target.mrk: Chcete-li doladit implementaci, dokončete konfiguraci ve třech fázích.

trans-unit.source: Configure New Companies

seg-source.mrk: Configure New Companies

target.mrk: Konfigurace nových společností

trans-unit.source: To configure a new company in your solution implementation, you typically follow three phases.

seg-source.mrk: To configure a new company in your solution implementation, you typically follow three phases.

target.mrk: Pro konfiguraci nové společnosti při vaší implementaci řešení obvykle postupujete podle tří fází.

trans-unit.source: In the first phase, you import the configuration package, a .rapidstart file with the configuration information.

seg-source.mrk: In the first phase, you import the configuration package, a .rapidstart file with the configuration information.

target.mrk: V první fázi importujete konfigurační balíček, soubor .rapidstart s konfiguračními informacemi.

trans-unit.source: In the second phase, you modify the configuration information and then apply it to your new company.

seg-source.mrk: In the second phase, you modify the configuration information and then apply it to your new company.

target.mrk: Ve druhé fázi změníte konfigurační informace a poté je použijete pro vaši novou společnost.

trans-unit.source: In the final phase, you review and fix any errors.

seg-source.mrk: In the final phase, you review and fix any errors.

target.mrk: V závěrečné fázi zkontrolujete a opravíte chyby.

trans-unit.source: The following procedures assume that you have created and saved a configuration package.

seg-source.mrk: The following procedures assume that you have created and saved a configuration package.

target.mrk: Následující postupy předpokládají, že jste vytvořili a uložili konfigurační balíček.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Prepare a Configuration Package](admin-how-to-prepare-a-configuration-package.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Prepare a Configuration Package](admin-how-to-prepare-a-configuration-package.md).

target.mrk: Pro více informací navštivte [Připravení konfiguračního balíčku](admin-how-to-prepare-a-configuration-package.md).

trans-unit.source: The following procedures assume that you have initialized and opened your new company and that you are using the RapidStart Services Implementer Role Center.

seg-source.mrk: The following procedures assume that you have initialized and opened your new company and that you are using the RapidStart Services Implementer Role Center.

target.mrk: Následující postupy předpokládají, že jste inicializovali a otevřeli novou společnost a že používáte roli Implementátor služeb RapidStart v Centru rolí.

trans-unit.source: To import a configuration package

seg-source.mrk: To import a configuration package

target.mrk: Pro import konfiguračního balíčku

trans-unit.source: Open the new company in the [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] database.

seg-source.mrk: Open the new company in the [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] database.

target.mrk: Otevřete novou společnost v databázi [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Configuration Packages**, and then select the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Configuration Packages**, and then select the related link.

target.mrk: Vyberte ikonu ![Žárovka, která otevře funkci Řekněte mi](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Řekněte mi, co chcete dělat"), zvolte **Konfigurační balíčky** a poté zvolte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: Choose the **Import Package** action.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the **Import Package** action.

target.mrk: Zvolte akci **Importovat balíček**.

trans-unit.source: Navigate to the location where you have saved the .rapidstart configuration package file, and then choose the **Open** button.

seg-source.mrk: Navigate to the location where you have saved the .rapidstart configuration package file, and then choose the **Open** button.

target.mrk: Přejděte do umístění, kam jste uložili soubor konfiguračního balíčku .rapidstart, a poté zvolte tlačítko **Otevřít**.

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Company Information**, and then choose the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Company Information**, and then choose the related link.

target.mrk: Vyberte ikonu ![Žárovka, která otevře funkci Řekněte mi](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Řekněte mi, co chcete dělat"), zvolte **Informace o společnosti** a poté vyberte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: Enter information about the company in the company information card.

seg-source.mrk: Enter information about the company in the company information card.

target.mrk: Na kartě firemních údajů zadejte informace o společnosti.

trans-unit.source: Include information, such as bank details.

seg-source.mrk: Include information, such as bank details.

target.mrk: Uveďte informace, jako jsou bankovní údaje.

trans-unit.source: You can also provide a logo for the company.

seg-source.mrk: You can also provide a logo for the company.

target.mrk: Můžete také poskytnout logo společnosti.

trans-unit.source: All the tables that you have designated for inclusion in the new company are imported.

seg-source.mrk: All the tables that you have designated for inclusion in the new company are imported.

target.mrk: Importují se všechny tabulky, které jste určili pro zařazení do nové společnosti.

trans-unit.source: At this point, you can apply the package data to the database, or adjust and modify the table data to meet your customer specifications.

seg-source.mrk: At this point, you can apply the package data to the database, or adjust and modify the table data to meet your customer specifications.

target.mrk: V tomto okamžiku můžete aplikovat data balíčku do databáze nebo přizpůsobit a upravit data tabulky tak, aby vyhovovala vašim požadavkům zákazníka.

trans-unit.source: To apply package data

seg-source.mrk: To apply package data

target.mrk: Pro aplikaci dat balíčku

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Configuration Worksheet**, and then select the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Configuration Worksheet**, and then select the related link.

target.mrk: Vyberte ikonu ![Žárovka, která otevře funkci Řekněte mi](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Řekněte mi, co chcete dělat"), zvolte **Konfigurační sešit** a poté zvolte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: Select a table that you want to modify data for, and then choose the **Apply Data** action.

seg-source.mrk: Select a table that you want to modify data for, and then choose the **Apply Data** action.

target.mrk: Vyberte tabulku, pro kterou chcete upravit data, a poté vyberte akci **Použít data**.

trans-unit.source: Choose the **Yes** button to confirm the application.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the **Yes** button to confirm the application.

target.mrk: Stisknutím tlačítka **Ano** potvrďte aplikaci.

trans-unit.source: To confirm that the data is now in the database and that the application has succeeded, return to the **Config. Worksheet** page and choose the **Database Data** action.

seg-source.mrk: To confirm that the data is now in the database and that the application has succeeded, return to the **Config.
Worksheet** page and choose the **Database Data** action.

target.mrk: Pro potvrzení, že data jsou nyní v databázi a že aplikace byla úspěšná, vraťte se na stránku **Konfigurační
sešit** a zvolte akci **Data databáze**.

trans-unit.source: After you apply data, you can only see it in the database.

seg-source.mrk: After you apply data, you can only see it in the database.

target.mrk: Po aplikování dat je můžete vidět pouze v databázi.

trans-unit.source: It is no longer in the package.

seg-source.mrk: It is no longer in the package.

target.mrk: Již nadále nejsou v balíčku.

trans-unit.source: To modify and apply package data

seg-source.mrk: To modify and apply package data

target.mrk: Pro upravení a aplikaci dat balíčku

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Configuration Worksheet**, and then select the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Configuration Worksheet**, and then select the related link.

target.mrk: Vyberte ikonu ![Žárovka, která otevře funkci Řekněte mi](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Řekněte mi, co chcete dělat"), zvolte **Konfigurační sešit** a poté zvolte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: Select a table that you want to modify data for, and then choose the **Package Data** action.

seg-source.mrk: Select a table that you want to modify data for, and then choose the **Package Data** action.

target.mrk: Vyberte tabulku, pro kterou chcete upravit data, a poté vyberte akci **Data balíčku**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Config. Package Records** page, make your modifications.

seg-source.mrk: On the **Config.
Package Records** page, make your modifications.

target.mrk: Na stránce **Záznamy
konfiguračního balíčku** proveďte úpravy.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can delete options that do not apply.

seg-source.mrk: For example, you can delete options that do not apply.

target.mrk: Můžete například odstranit možnosti, které se neaplikují.

trans-unit.source: Choose the **Apply Data** action, and then choose the **OK** button.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the **Apply Data** action, and then choose the **OK** button.

target.mrk: Zvolte akci **Použít data** a poté klepněte na tlačítko **OK**.

trans-unit.source: To confirm that the data is now in the database and that the application has succeeded, return to the **Config. Worksheet** page and choose the **Database Data** action.

seg-source.mrk: To confirm that the data is now in the database and that the application has succeeded, return to the **Config.
Worksheet** page and choose the **Database Data** action.

target.mrk: Pro potvrzení, že data jsou nyní v databázi a že aplikace byla úspěšná, vraťte se na stránku **Konfigurační
sešit** a zvolte akci **Data databáze**.

trans-unit.source: To locate and identify a configuration error

seg-source.mrk: To locate and identify a configuration error

target.mrk: Pro vyhledání a identifikaci chyby konfigurace

trans-unit.source: There are certain types of errors that may occur when you apply data to a database.

seg-source.mrk: There are certain types of errors that may occur when you apply data to a database.

target.mrk: Při aplikaci dat do databáze se mohou vyskytnout určité typy chyb.

trans-unit.source: The most common error is that required related tables were not included.

seg-source.mrk: The most common error is that required related tables were not included.

target.mrk: Nejčastější chybou je, že požadované související tabulky nebyly zahrnuty.

trans-unit.source: You fix such errors in the configuration worksheet.

seg-source.mrk: You fix such errors in the configuration worksheet.

target.mrk: Tyto chyby opravíte v konfiguračním sešitu.

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Configuration Packages**, and then select the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Configuration Packages**, and then select the related link.

target.mrk: Vyberte ikonu ![Žárovka, která otevře funkci Řekněte mi](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Řekněte mi, co chcete dělat"), zvolte **Konfigurační balíčky** a poté zvolte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: Select the package you want to review, and then choose the **Edit** action.

seg-source.mrk: Select the package you want to review, and then choose the **Edit** action.

target.mrk: Vyberte balíček, který chcete zkontrolovat, a poté vyberte akci **Upravit**.

trans-unit.source: Any table that has errors is highlighted.

seg-source.mrk: Any table that has errors is highlighted.

target.mrk: Tabulky, které obsahují chyby, jsou zvýrazněny.

trans-unit.source: The number of package errors is displayed in the **No. of Package Errors** field.

seg-source.mrk: The number of package errors is displayed in the **No. of Package Errors** field.

target.mrk: Počet chyb balíčku je zobrazen v poli **Počet chyb balíčku**.

trans-unit.source: Choose the **No. of Package Errors** field to open the **Config. Package Records** page, which lists the records with errors.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the **No. of Package Errors** field to open the **Config.
Package Records** page, which lists the records with errors.

target.mrk: Zvolte pole **Počet chyb balíčku** a otevřete stránku **Záznamy
konfiguračního balíčku**, kde jsou uvedeny záznamy s chybami.

trans-unit.source: To fix an error

seg-source.mrk: To fix an error

target.mrk: Pro opravení chyby

trans-unit.source: Open the company that is based on your configuration package.

seg-source.mrk: Open the company that is based on your configuration package.

target.mrk: Otevřete společnost, která je založena na vašem konfiguračním balíčku.

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Configuration Worksheet**, and then select the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Configuration Worksheet**, and then select the related link.

target.mrk: Vyberte ikonu ![Žárovka, která otevře funkci Řekněte mi](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Řekněte mi, co chcete dělat"), zvolte **Konfigurační sešit** a poté zvolte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: Fix errors, such as add missing related tables to the worksheet.

seg-source.mrk: Fix errors, such as add missing related tables to the worksheet.

target.mrk: Opravte chyby, jako je například přidání chybějících souvisejících tabulek do sešitu.

trans-unit.source: Add the tables to the existing configuration package, or create a new package that only contains the new tables.

seg-source.mrk: Add the tables to the existing configuration package, or create a new package that only contains the new tables.

target.mrk: Přidejte tabulky do existujícího konfiguračního balíčku nebo vytvořte nový balíček, který obsahuje pouze nové tabulky.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Prepare a Configuration Package](admin-how-to-prepare-a-configuration-package.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Prepare a Configuration Package](admin-how-to-prepare-a-configuration-package.md).

target.mrk: Pro více informací navštivte [Připravení konfiguračního balíčku](admin-how-to-prepare-a-configuration-package.md).

trans-unit.source: Reopen the new company that you are implementing the configuration for.

seg-source.mrk: Reopen the new company that you are implementing the configuration for.

target.mrk: Znovu otevřete novou společnost, pro kterou implementujete konfiguraci.

trans-unit.source: Import the configuration package.

seg-source.mrk: Import the configuration package.

target.mrk: Importujte konfigurační balíček.

trans-unit.source: If you import the same package again, you may overwrite any data modifications that you have already made.

seg-source.mrk: If you import the same package again, you may overwrite any data modifications that you have already made.

target.mrk: Pokud znovu importujete stejný balíček, můžete přepsat všechny již provedené úpravy dat.

trans-unit.source: For that reason, you may want to add any new tables in a new package and import that instead.

seg-source.mrk: For that reason, you may want to add any new tables in a new package and import that instead.

target.mrk: Z tohoto důvodu můžete chtít přidat některé nové tabulky do nového balíčku a importovat je.

trans-unit.source: Apply the data to the database, as described in [To modify and apply package data](admin-how-to-configure-new-companies.md#to-modify-and-apply-package-data).

seg-source.mrk: Apply the data to the database, as described in [To modify and apply package data](admin-how-to-configure-new-companies.md#to-modify-and-apply-package-data).

target.mrk: Aplikujte data do databáze, jak je popsáno v části [Pro upravení a aplikaci dat balíčku](admin-how-to-configure-new-companies.md#to-modify-and-apply-package-data).

trans-unit.source: See Also

seg-source.mrk: See Also

target.mrk: Viz také

trans-unit.source: [Apply Configurations to New Companies](admin-apply-configuration-to-new-companies.md)

seg-source.mrk: Apply Configurations to New Companies

target.mrk: Aplikování konfigurace pro nové společnosti

trans-unit.source: [Setting Up a Company With RapidStart Services](admin-set-up-a-company-with-rapidstart.md)

seg-source.mrk: Setting Up a Company With RapidStart Services

target.mrk: Založení společnosti pomocí služeb RapidStart

trans-unit.source: [Administration](admin-setup-and-administration.md)

seg-source.mrk: Administration

target.mrk: Správa
